Ingredients.5: 1 tablespoon vegan margarine (or butter), or more as needed

Ingredients.6: 1 Chopped parsley, chives or other herbs, for garnish

Directions.1: Bring Silk and salt to a boil in a medium saucepan. Slowly stir in cornmeal.

Directions.2: Return to a boil, then reduce to a simmer and cook for 15 minutes until very thick, stirring often to prevent polenta from sticking to pan.

Directions.3: Remove from heat and stir in cream cheese and margarine until fully incorporated.

Directions.4: Spoon into a serving dish or press gently into a large oiled bowl, then turn over for molded polenta.

Directions.5: Garnish with parsley, chives or other chopped herbs.
